responsibilities: Develop and maintain scalable, secure, and high-performance data architectures to support business needs and ensure the organization’s data ecosystem operates effectively.
Design, implement, and optimize complex data pipelines for real-time and batch processing using technologies such as Spark, Kafka, and cloud-based ETL tools.
Implement a robust data quality framework to ensure the highest quality of data on the platform.
Automate manual processes, monitor data systems, and resolve data quality issues.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on developing and maintaining data architectures, designing data pipelines, ensuring data quality, and automating processes. These tasks are centered around data engineering and do not involve training or fine-tuning language models. Therefore, this activity is not relevant to the job responsibilities.
